column2: "Na asomafo nye enuanom a wɔwɔ Judea no tsee dɛ amanamamfo so agye Nyankopɔn asɛm no."
"Na Peter baa Jerusalɛm no
column3: hɔn a wofi etwatsiafo mu no nye no akasakasa dɛ
column5: "Ɔwo akɔ mbarimba a wɔnnyɛ etwatsiafo mu

column2: "Na Peter hyɛɛ asɛm no ase kaa no esiado kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column5: na m'enyiwa wiaa me ma mokɔr tsebea fofor mu na muhun m'enyido adze
column6: adze bi a orisian a ɔtse dɛ abradaa kɛse a wɔakyekyer no etwaanan rigyaa mu fi sor

column2: "na megyeen m'enyi hwɛɛ mu no
column3: muhun asaase mbowa a wotsia ntwɛrnan nye hambowa nye hɔn a wɔweawea nye wimu ntumbowa nyina wɔ mu."

column2: "Na metsee ndze bi a ɔsee me dɛ
column3: Peter

column2: "Na mesee dɛ
column3: Dabida
column4: Ewuradze: osiandɛ biribiara a ɔyɛ ekyiwadze anaadɛ no ho nntsew nnkɔr m'anomu da."

column2: "Na ndze no fi sor buaa ne mprɛnu dɛ
column3: Dza Nyankopɔn asan ho no

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ iyi mprɛnsa
column3: na afei wɔtwetwee ne nyina kɔr sor bio."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: amonmu hɔ ara na mbarimba baasa baa ofi a yɛwɔ mu no ano a wɔsomaa hɔn fii Kaesarea baa me nkyɛn."

column2: "Na Sunsum no see me dɛ menye hɔn nkɔ
column3: na mma mennyɛ nyiyimu. Na enuanom beesia yi kegyaa me
column4: na yɛkɛhɛɛn ɔbarimba no ne fie;"

column2: "na ɔkaa mbrɛ ohun ɔbɔfo no wɔ ne fie
column3: dɛ ogyina hɔ rese no dɛ
column4: Soma nyimpa kɔ Jopa kehyia Simon a wɔfrɛ no Peter so kyerɛɛ hɛn:"

column2: "ɔno na ɔbɛka wo nsɛm a ɔwo nye wo fiemba nyina nam do benya nkwa."
"Na mehyɛɛ ase rekasa no
column3: Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no boguu hɔn do dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛse no oguu hɛn so do no."

column2: "Na mekaa Ewuradze asɛm a ɔkaa dɛ
column3: John dze
column4: ɔdze nsu numae; na hom dze

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: sɛ Nyankopɔn akyɛ hɔn akyɛdze kor no ara dɛ hɛn so a yɛgyee Ewuradze Jesus Kraest dzii no a
column4: emi nye woana na mubotum esiw Nyankopɔn kwan?"

column2: "Na wɔtsee yinom no
column3: wɔyɛɛ komm
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam see dɛ
column5: Nna kyerɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn ama amanamamba so nnuho a ɔdze kɔ nkwa mu."

column2: "Na hɔn a ahohia a ɔbaa Stefen do no ntsi wɔpetsee no
column3: wokyinii kodur Fonisia nye Siprus nye Antiok
column4: na wɔannka asɛm no annkyerɛ obiara dɛ Jewfo nko."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom yɛ Siprusfo nye Sirenefo; hɔn na wɔbaa Antiok no
column3: wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Helenefo  no so kaa Ewuradze Jesus ho asɛmpa no."
column4: "#11.20 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom ka dɛ: Griikfo."

column2: "Na Ewuradze ne nsa nye hɔn nam
column3: na nyimpa pii a wɔgyee dzii no wɔdanee baa Ewuradze hɔ."

column2: "Na yinom ho nsɛm dur asɔr a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm asomu
column3: na wɔsomaa Barnabas dɛ onkekyin nkodu Antiok;"

column2: "ɔno na ɔbae
column3: na obohun Nyankopɔn adom no
column5: na otuu hɔn nyina fo dɛ wonsi hɔn adwen pi ntakyer Ewuradze ho:"

column2: "osiandɛ Barnabas yɛ nyimpa papa
column3: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn nye gyedzi so ahyɛ no ma; na nyimpadodow pii baa Ewuradze hɔ."

column2: "Na ofii hɔ kɔr Tarsus kɔhwehwɛɛ Saul
column6: na wɔnye asɔrmba no dzii ehyia araa afrenhyia
column7: na wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ nyimpadodow pii. Antiok hɔ na wodzii kan too esuafo no Kristianfo."

column2: "Na nda no mu no nkɔnhyɛfo fii Jerusalɛm baa Antiok."
"Na hɔn mu kor a ne dzin dze Agabus gyinae nam Sunsum no do kyerɛɛ dɛ ɔkɔm kɛse bi rebɛba asaase nyina do: ɔno na ɔbae wɔ Klaudius ber do no."
"Na esuafo no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu biara botum no
column4: bɔɔ hɔn tsirmu dɛ wɔdze biribi bɔmona enuanom a wɔtse Judea dze akɔhwɛ hɔn:"

column2: "ɔno na wɔyɛe
column3: na wɔdze somaa Barnabas nye Saul dze kɛmaa mpanyimfo no."
